text: Hey guys, does anyone know if the HubSpot api allows us to connect GPT into the HubSpot chat bot?
done!
Are you able to use <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/workflows/custom-code-actions|Custom Coded Action>?

How can I get standard first, previous, and last pagination data and discrete numbered pages using HubSpot API v3? I understand how to get the next page data using GET cms/v3/pages/landing-pages and paging.next.after, But how do i go back to the very first page or any random page in between

Hi there, we have integrations with HubSpot whereby the source is always "Offline sources". Can anyone direct me to documentation or provide guidance on how we can specify the source so its not lumbered in with the generic "offline sources"? - I haven't been able to find anything on the documentation website so far

Yes it is possible with this api <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/webhooks-in-bots>

You just need a micro service that catches webhook and make request to GPT api and then parses GPT anwser to HubSpot's bot format.

I've run into the same issue, looks like the response you get has been altered.

old: <http://cdnp1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/[portalId]/[foldername]/[fileId]|cdnp1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/[portalId]/[foldername]/[fileId]>
new: <http://cdnp1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hub/[portalId]/[fileId]|cdnp1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hub/[portalId]/[fileId]>

I don't think so <@UJLMJNX6G> - I believe I need to go the Custom Workflow Actions route so I can eventually list it as an app in the Marketplace. But I'm relatively new to HubSpot App development, and the documentation around Custom Workflow Actions is pretty basic, so I'm not 100% sure

hey there
When I want to create contact using HubSpot api but I didn't get the api key from HubSpot account .
This message was deleted.
Yea, do you know if they notify about this changes?
I haven't seen any. I also use the signed url api to pass the file along. That one is also broken now
You're definitely going to want to delete that image
Everyone can see the key
To solve your issue though you'll want to use a private apps instead of a hapikey: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/private-apps>
And you'll also want to use the v4 apis instead of the v1 <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
<@U04TZC2AP6Z> I have gone ahead and removed your comment here as the image you posted contained sensitive information. I highly encourage you to rotate your API Key.

Hello,

I'm trying to link contacts across form submissions using the Forms API. As I understand, I have to pass a `usertoken` for HubSpot to know who that user is. It seems that once a contact is created the `usertoken` is immediately associated with that and cannot be changed.

Is it possible to associate the `usertoken` to the latest created contact created instead of the first?

Alternatively, if I could regenerate that token manually that could work too.
Is it possible to make this an app for the HubSpot marketplace?
No sorry, Carter's suggestion of a proxy is the best that I have. We don't have a way to configure static IPs on our end at this time.
Currently no, you can't build apps for chatflows yet, you can just send data to a server from a chatflow and then respond with whatever the server sends back
Damn
We have a client that wants me to build him a custom trained ai and plug it into their HubSpot chat bot
If you could <@UF6U20T3K> at Resonate would be all over it, lol
you can do that
super easy
But I don’t want to just add it to their HubSpot
Oh I know
I want to charge them monthly and was hoping to try and make it look more like a saas that they are purchasing instead of just a web hook I chucked in their HubSpot
Any suggestions?
But I was hoping to try and market this idea to other people
Yeah the aws lambda idea is pretty much the best option at this point in time
What’s that idea sorry?
<https://www.resonatehq.com/openai-gpt-3-integration-with-HubSpot>
Create a lambda to catch the webhooks feed that to openai and send the response back to the chatflow
charge the client based on usage
That’s what I was thinking
Is that was resonate does?
yes
for all intensive purposes
Yeah
Sweet, thanks heaps bro!
of course
Don't think you can
You also (to my knowledge) can't include CCAs
Where do you see the type extension?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/v3/create_workflow>
Yeah I was able to add my create custom workflow to a custom workflow
It's not in the list
Right but I got it added !!
With the type of extension
What that's awesome, how did you find that out? OPENAPI?

Hey, I did everything! But I can’t figure out how to grab responses from the webhook and send it back to the customer through the hubchat

Hey everyone, I am trying to use a webhook in the chat flow. I see in the docs that Advanced users also have the option of including JSON in your webhook’s response. By doing this, you can impact the flow of conversation or send a custom message. How do I get this custom message to send back to the user?
